text: Turner Network Television (TNT) (stylized as TNT Drama) is an American cable and satellite television network. It is owned by the Turner Broadcasting System division of WarnerMedia. The channel's programming consists of television series and feature movies. It broadcasts mostly dramatic programming, along with some professional sports events. The sports events include NBA basketball games and PGA golf. As of February 2015, TNT was available to about 95.3 million households (81.9% of households with at least one television set) in the United States. TNT was launched on October 3, 1988. , TNT was received by approximately 89.573 million households that subscribe to a subscription television service throughout the United States. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American television networks Category:1988 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Atlanta
title: TNT (American TV network)
